attributes.action: change the car valeting business from being listed as car wash to tradesmen
attributes.additional_details: I am loosing out on a lot of money with no government help along the was as I don’t own a business premises and unable to claim funding putting a huge amount of strain to myself and family
attributes.background: During the current lockdown rules, my business has been told to close on the basis that I am classed as a car wash. Cleaners and tradesmen are ok to go into peoples homes, working on cohort groups but I am unable to sanitise a car, in the open air, zero contact and lone working

rejection.details:
Car washes are on the list of businesses that have been required to close during the current lockdown, but car repair businesses are allowed to remain open.

If you want businesses providing certain services to be added to the list of businesses permitted to remain open you could start a petition requesting this, but it would need to be clear exactly what businesses you wanted to be allowed to remain open.
